Harold Edward Taylor (October 6, 1938 â€“ January 27, 2020) was an American politician who served as a member of the South Carolina Legislature from 1975 until 1980.
Political career
Taylor served from 1975 to 1980 in the South Carolina House of Representatives.  He also served in the US Navy.
